settings.title: Warranty
settings.content: this warranty text is not part of metafields

The case remains sharp with well defined lugs and clear numbers. The factory white gold bezel is also in excellent condition and looks stunning on the contrasting yellow gold case.

This reference also by default comes with a diamond dial. This very example does bear a diamond dial too but not just any diamond dial. This watch is fitted with a insanely rare original Stella diamond dial.
Promotions, new products and sales. Directly to your inbox.
